snippet: SAVITS--Ruth. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Ruth Savits, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Ruth's children, Cheri Friedman (Steven) and Carol Klein (Robert); her grandchildren, Mark (Sala), Danny, Jenny, Andrea, and Toby; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
